programme.title: The Hellbenders
programme.desc: After the civil war, a hell-bent Confederate Army Officer and his sons rob a Union Caravan carrying a fortune, killing every man and beast in the process. Now they must con and fight their way across the west through thousands of cavalry, lawmen, bounty hunters, and Indians to make their escape.

programme.title: My Super Ex-Girlfriend
programme.desc: A man discovers that the woman he is dating is a superhero and decides to break up with her. However, things do not go as he planned when she uses her powers to turn his life into a nightmare.

programme.title: The Gold Rush
programme.desc: During the Klondike Gold Rush, a lone prospector goes through a series of misfortunes, including a blizzard and starvation. However, he finds love even in the stormy Alaska.

programme.title: Mune
programme.desc: Necross, the former guardian of the sun, turns evil and steals it. Now, Mune, Glim and Sohone, three friends, must work together to retrieve it back from him.

programme.title: DSC
programme.desc: Talented directors provide an entertaining insight into the most intriguing stories and anecdotes concerning some of their best works.

programme.title: Hollywood on Set
programme.desc: The key aspects of filmmaking are explored, with behind-the-scenes insights and intriguing interviews with prominent cast and crew members.

programme.title: The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: Oren is deliberately mean to the people around him. However, he is forced to change his attitude and take help from his neighbour Leah when he is asked to look after his nine-year-old granddaughter.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of a demonic serial killer, Edgar Reese. However, questions arise when the murders start again, eerily matching the modus operandi of Reese.

programme.title: The Great Dictator
programme.desc: After suffering from memory loss, a soldier returns to his former profession as a barber and attempts to escape persecution by the military forces.

programme.title: Marley & Me
programme.desc: A newlywed couple's life transforms after adopting Marley, a mischievous dog whose antics bring joy. Subsequently, as they navigate parenthood with their baby's arrival, Marley completes their family.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: Realising that Sam has still not come to terms with his wife Maggie's death, his eight-year-old son Jonah forces him to call a national radio talk show, with the hopes of finding him a companion.

programme.title: Safe Haven
programme.desc: A mysterious young woman arrives in Southport, North Carolina, and falls in love with a widowed store owner. However, her dark past intrudes in her new life.

programme.title: The Addams Family 2
programme.desc: Gomez Addams frets his children are drifting from him and Morticia. He packs the family into their haunted camper, embarking on a bizarre vacation to reconnect.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
programme.desc: A neurotic thirty-something woman resolves to finally take control of her life once and for all, while looking for h love.

programme.title: A Dog's Way Home
programme.desc: When Lucas sends his beloved dog, Bella, far away to safety, she begins an arduous journey across Colorado to be reunited with him.

programme.title: Legally Blonde
programme.desc: Elle Woods, a fashionable sorority girl, enrols in Harvard Law School to win back her ex-boyfriend. Despite initial struggles, she discovers her true potential and excels in her studies.

programme.title: Life or Something Like It
programme.desc: A Seattle reporter's life is shaken when a street seer predicts her imminent death, pushing her to rethink love, friendship and career choices.

programme.title: Life or Something Like It
programme.desc: A Seattle reporter's life is shaken when a street seer predicts her imminent death, pushing her to rethink love, friendship and career choices.

programme.title: Lay the Favorite
programme.desc: Ambitious about living the life of a cocktail waitress, a lap dancer tries her luck in Las Vegas. However, her life takes an unexpected turn after she falls in love with a sports gambler.

programme.title: Land of the Bears
programme.desc: The filmmaker shines a light on the lives of five wild brown bears inhabiting the Kamchatka Peninsula, exploring their daily adventures and activities.
